alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 9:58PM CDT until April 14 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FREMONT AND SOUTHEASTERN MILLS COUNTIES... At 958 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Silver City to 2 miles southwest of Emerson to 2 miles southwest of Essex, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. These storms have a history of producing wind strong enough to overturn a semi. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shenandoah, Malvern, Tabor, Randolph, Hastings and Imogene. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
